Exclusive Funding Traders Trading Offer

Funding Traders, based in the United Arab Emirates, was established in April 2023. It is a CFD firm offering 1 Step, 2 Steps and Instant program types. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $300,000. Platforms supported include MT5 and TradeLocker. confirmed by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Funding Traders Promo Code: 31% OFF Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with Funding Traders using our exclusive discount code. validated for the current trading season.
